name: The Sweetie Candy
description:
On a continent that is far away, there exists a mystery fairy candy happy kingdom. All the buildings and even flowers and trees are made of candies. The sea water is sweet, even parting is sweet!

The air is full of bliss. In the kingdom there are many cheerful wee candies. One of them determined to become the most sweet and popular ultimate dessert, he will make the dream come true with his friends!

- You must not have seen an evoluting candy

- Grow you candy!

- Sweeten you life

- This sweet candy is free for you!

- Taste every sweetness offered to you!
